Article.ArticleTitle: Response to the letter by de Boer et al. (2022).

MedlineCitation.CoiStatement: Pentti J. Tienari holds a patent in C9orf72 diagnostics and treatment of ALS/FTD. Other authors declare that they have no competing interests.
